name: Operation Creature Feature
description:
PLAYSTATION®Eye required. In an alternate universe, creatures known as "Blurbs" have been enslaved to work in mines. As an agent of the Alien Liberation Front, it is your mission to enter the mines and guide the Blurbs out. Move your hands to guide the Blurbs through 30 levels filled with trapdoors, hot liquid metal, slick ice slopes and other wacky hazards. Can you rescue the helpless Blurbs Operation Creature Feature™?

Operation Creature Feature is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment Europe. ©2007 Sony Computer Entertainment Europe.
